short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create Notes & Notebooks from anywhere in the web

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
When you use Candorium you have the power to share your research, discuss investment strategies, and receive feedback, to enhance your decision-making process
Candorium makes organizing your research easy. 
Stop sifting through countless long research reports, jotting down ideas from articles, and bookmarking pages from books and magazines. 
Use the "Notes&Notebooks" to collect all your research about your investment strategies and the scenarios you are considering, in one place.
Whether it's research reports, web articles and images, snippets from books and magazines or even quotes from government agencies and regulatory filings, the CANDOR button helps you gather and organize everything on your personal Candorium pinboard.
